name: Don't Touch The Sky Color
description:
Hello!

I'm making a game that would represent the dimension on physics perspective. In the first stage, that has be done for now, will be showed the four dimension that is the time representation. 

The whole game can be played using WASD or ARROWS and the right button of the mouse. I do RECOMMEND that turn the audio on to listen if you pressed the button.

Next steps is make more phases that which one represent a physics dimension. I hope you enjoyed the idea and the game. I'm open to suggestion and perhaps a teammate.

This game has start with the purpose of participate the Game JAM: "De Space Jam!" and the theme is "More Than One Dimension"
